channel.title: Custom npc's?
channel.description: Yeah i have noticed that some server's has got custom npc's ,like CAR. How People do that. Same thing with custom items...

item.title: Custom npc's?
item.dc:creator: @cocoa cocoa
item.description:
@cocoa wrote:

Jordiescape:

It’s a thing called model editing/hardcoding. I and many other people have the ability to edit models, using metaseq, DATmaker and RSMV. And then we add the ints into the needed class and then add the model ingame. Can’t expalin it very good =/.

You don’t need to hardcode it… You could make an item.zip and pack all your models then make your models load from there ftw…

Read full topic
